meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is combed upward and back from the forehead.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair into elegant quiffs for the party.
meanings.sent2: His favorite hairstyle is the classic quiffs that give him a retro look.
meanings.sent3: The quiffs on her head made her look taller than usual.
meanings.sent4: Her quiffs were like fluffy clouds floating above her forehead.
meanings.sent5: The barber created perfect quiffs that stayed in place all day.

meanings.definition: A puff or pad of hair worn over the forehead.
meanings.sent1: The actress added quiffs to her costume to enhance her character's look.
meanings.sent2: He used a hair accessory to create stylish quiffs for the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The quiffs on his head made him resemble a historical figure.
meanings.sent4: Her quiffs were like a crown of hair framing her face.
meanings.sent5: The quiffs added a touch of glamour to her overall appearance.
